review: Doper easy to hook up and install. Even better than expected.
author: rebecca anderson

review: Terrible product. Could never maintain internet connection. Remote goes out of control or just stops working altogether for hours at a time. Roku isn't great but it is ten times the product that the fire stick is. Swing and a miss amazon.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works great in my living room near my internet connection, does not work on my bedroom tv.  Too far from wireless connection??
author: Texas mom

review: Terrible device does nothing but freeze up
author: Chris

review: Love it the speed and ease for streaming is great
author: John J. Hinde

review: Works as advertised. I enjoy it.
author: steven d lowrie

review: I love this product so far. Bye bye cable !
author: Darla L Henrickson
